column1: The COVID-19 pandemic has heavily impacted our small businesses this year. If you have the means to please support a local small business today. #SmallBusinessSaturday https://t.co/7mvFqgU7u5

This is excellent news!   This event means a great deal to so many people especially the families of our fallen. However I encourage you to continue using caution if you choose to participate this year. https://t.co/zvGYrSMg2M

This is fantastic news! #Moderna said it plans to ask federal health authorities by early Dec. to clear the vaccine. If greenlighted the shot could go into distribution that month. A job well done by Moderna & the Trump Administration!  https://t.co/Bij3X5T37C #FL02

Thanks to Operation Warp Speed & the Trump Administration if the FDA approves the Pfizer vaccine we will have 100 million doses ready for distribution. Americans will be able to receive the vaccine free of cost. #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/VBKWn5l0jE

Though we are still waiting on the results of the Pres race I would like to take a moment to thank you for re-electing me to represent you in the US House of Reps. Serving in this role has been a true privilege & I look forward to fighting for #FL02 in the 117th Congress.

My Republican colleagues & I are committed to restoring rebuilding & renewing this great nation. We must focus on boosting our economy aiding our small businesses & farmers supporting our military & veterans & ensure safety for you & your family. #FL02 https://t.co/bZrYiCrhWY

I’m pleased to see that my colleagues in the Senate agree. Amy Coney Barrett is the right choice for the U.S. Supreme Court and I’m confident that we will see great things come from her during her time as a Supreme Court Justice. #ACB #SCOTUS

Amy Coney Barrett has a strong record in protecting the right to life and our Constitution. She will serve as a positive role model for this country not only as an experienced and exceptional jurist but also as a dedicated parent. #ACB #SCOTUS https://t.co/I5PbHMNDNq

I'm deeply saddened by the tragic loss of Chief Greg Graham. Greg was a tremendous leader who was beloved by many. His kindness and generosity will surely be missed. My prayers and condolences are with his family and the Ocala Police Department. #FL02 https://t.co/XufJiNhBSo
Please join me today in reflecting not on what was lost but what we have accomplished since this devastating storm. We are #850Strong! (3/3) #HurricaneMichael #FL02

I'm grateful for every one of you who stepped up to help our area recover and rebuild. It's because of you that we've made such steady progress in the last two years. It is my pleasure to represent such a strong and resilient district. (2/3) #FL02 #850Strong

2 yrs ago today #HurricaneMichael struck our district. I'll never forget the devastation we saw in the days following. I'll also never forget the generosity compassion & perseverance I saw from people in our communities. (1/3) #FL02 #850Strong https://t.co/x0CtiYWvXl

The American people deserve more choices for patients lower care for patients & better care for patients. The America First #Healthcare Plan ensures just that. Read more about it here: https://t.co/uQHXT6kS2U #FL02 https://t.co/BQ4z52wKBR

Pending FDA Emergency Use Authorizations we may have up to 100 mil doses of FDA-authorized vaccine by the end of the year & project having manufactured enough doses for every American who wants a vaccine by March-April 2021. #OperationWarpSpeed #COVID19

The Trump Administration’s goal is to ensure every American can get a safe & effective #COVID19 vaccine w/o any out of pocket cost. Any vaccine or therapeutic doses purchased w/ U.S. taxpayer $$ will be given to the American people at no cost. #operationwarpspeed https://t.co/4P1fYOsp9M
Happy birthday @SteveScalise!  Thanks for your dedication & leadership. It is an absolute pleasure working with you. https://t.co/fqj4YYf5Z8

The Bonifay USPS location is closed due to damage from #HurricaneSally. According to the USPS Consumer & Industry Manager for the Gulf Atlantic District repairs are scheduled to be completed by Oct 29th. As of right now there is no definitive reopen date. #FL02 https://t.co/YrKKidBznF

Great news! @fema has announced a federal grant totaling $11438154.98 for the Calhoun Liberty Hospital.  This funding will be used to replace the Main Hospital Building that was damaged during #HurricaneMichael. https://t.co/gnpGbiAswf #FL02

For months Nancy Pelosi has held up aid for our small businesses. This week my Republican colleagues & I said enough & that it’s time to bring this bill to the House floor for a vote. Read my full release here: https://t.co/whnBgR9AFv #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/2fi1zaKMTy
My prayers are with @realDonaldTrump & Melania as well as all of those currently recovering from #COVID19. (2/2)

I’m wishing @realDonaldTrump & Melania a speedy recovery. #COVID19 is a tough adversary; however the President & First Lady are fighters. We’ve made outstanding progress with treatments in the past few months & I’m confident that both will overcome this quickly. (1/2)
Today I introduced H.R. 8443 the Cottage Homes to Improve Lives for Dependents (CHILD) Act. Click here for more info - https://t.co/HBv4NLNaW0 #FL02 https://t.co/CwNivSDdbf

Democrats want to defund destroy & dismantle our country.   Republicans have a better plan —  ✅Renew the American dream ✅Restore our way of life ✅Rebuild the greatest economy ever  This plan is pro-worker pro-family & pro-growth. #FL02 https://t.co/HeYYfABtoG
Florida is moving into Phase 3. We're making steady progress. That said please continue to take the proper precautions to keep you and your family safe. #FL02 https://t.co/gdhWSGv1kF
My friend @DrPhilRoe is right! Now more than ever we need the best and the brightest. https://t.co/sVAZwdSkmU

This is outstanding news! #FL02 has seen its fair share of storms & it is crucial that we get the help we need to recover from #HurricaneSally. I appreciate @realDonaldTrump & his Administration's assistance in rebuilding FL's Panhandle. https://t.co/TYUFK93TKx

GREAT NEWS! My bill The Veteran’s Prostate Cancer Research & Treatment Act (H.R. 6092) passed in the House today. I’m proud of this bill & my colleagues for joining me in the fight against this deadly adversary.   Read my full release here: https://t.co/tQJYqm6Gd1 #FL02 https://t.co/wW2M82vBCK

ONLY 8 DAYS LEFT - The #Census2020 affects funding for schools healthcare block grants & representation. #FL02 currently has one of the lowest self-response rates in the state. Let’s make sure we are all counted by Sept 30th.   Fill it out here - https://t.co/TWmgG3pXPm https://t.co/7iVqQmdKHn

House Dems have excluded essential resources for American farmers and their families in the CR including funding that’s used for Farm Bill programs. I find this despicable. Our farmers deserve better. When will @SpeakerPelosi stop with the partisan games? #FL02

#OperationWarpSpeed is not only an effort to find a #COVID19 COVID19 vaccine; it's an effort to find safe & effective therapeutics as well. I'm amazed by the scientific advancements we've seen in the past few months. Watch the video below to learn more. #FL02 https://t.co/PdDvSqOOLz

Today we pay tribute to those who are listed as Prisoners Of War or Missing In Action. These men and women have endured the unthinkable and their sacrifice and selflessness will never be forgotten. #FL02 #POWMIARecognitionDay https://t.co/AMSrEwkjda

On this day in 1787 our Founding Fathers signed the Constitution.   I encourage you to take some time to reflect on the freedoms and liberties we enjoy today and the work it took to get where we are now. #ConstitutionDay https://t.co/oF0NLpd9RR

I commend @GovRonDeSantis for being proactive in requesting assistance for the Panhandle. #FL has seen its fair share of storms and we know how critical it is to prepare and protect. #HurricaneSally #FL02 https://t.co/4VlFJowVm1
HAPPENING NOW -- Join us live here: https://t.co/Q4LnbPkR0v #FL02 https://t.co/7bFH7ORVwH

Florida A&M University has done it again. For the second year in a row @FAMU_1887 earned the #1 top Historically Black College & University title. Read my FULL statement here: https://t.co/cHGjzm9ZN7 #FL

Today’s announcement reflects something that we in North #FL have known for some time – that @floridastate  is among our nation’s finest institutions of higher learning.  Full statement here: https://t.co/aNrGzGCVB5 #FL02 @FSUPresThrasher

May we #neverforget the lives lost on September 11th 2001. May we continue to remember the bravery & sacrifice of our first responders. And may we never let go of what it means to be an American. #FL02 https://t.co/uO8ZMYpc97

The U.S. Dept of Labor has announced that the economy added 1.4 million jobs in Aug -- putting the unemployment rate below 10% for the 1st time since March. This is a positive indicator that we're making steady progress in renewing restoring & rebuilding our great nation! #FL02 https://t.co/7ial6oP2Rx

America cannot afford to ignore our dependence on supply chains that include #China any longer. This is a foreign power that is not an ally & must be dealt with through strong diplomacy & a clear-eyed sense of realism. Read more here - https://t.co/HgZrgd9Mw9 #FL02

Additionally the FL Irrigation Recovery Block Grant Program is now available to agricultural producers who suffered damage to their crop & irrigation system as a result of #HurricaneMichael. The deadline is also Nov. 20. Learn more here: https://t.co/9SpX4VYlqe #FL02

GREAT NEWS -- Registration for the Timber Recovery Block Grant for Florida’s timber industry impacted by #HurricaneMichael is now available. The deadline is Nov. 20th. Learn more here: https://t.co/WzUoNTwsT6 #FL02

Our energy is better focused on fixing unemployment ensuring our schools can open safely & expanding testing & treatments. The well-being of our nation is more important than baseless election conspiracies & that is what should be prioritized. #DemsAreGoingPostal #FL02

It’s absurd that Congress is wasting taxpayer dollars to come in on a Saturday for the USPS (an entity that is already funded well past November) & not to vote on a relief package for Americans who actually need relief. #FL02 #DemsAreGoingPostal

We cannot afford to let the Dems’ latest conspiracy theory distract us from the millions of Americans who are hurting. With the current pandemic American families are facing unemployment pay cuts health risks & uncertainty about sending their children back to school. #FL02 https://t.co/qM9piawPVY
Don’t fall for the hysteria. This is yet again the Democrats attempting to steal the election. #DemsAreGoingPostal #FL02

USPS also routinely moves mailboxes that receive little use. More than 14000 mailboxes were removed under President Obama. Democrats are using this routine practice to amplify misinformation and add to their baseless conspiracy theory. #FL02

Here are the FACTS - the Postal Service is NOT broke.  Projections currently show that the US Postal Service currently has enough funding to last thru at least August 2021 long after the presidential election. #FL02

Today is not only FL's Primary Day but also the 100th Anniversary of the ratification of the #19thAmendment. This amendment helped women fight for equality in all aspects of life. Please join me in remembering the perseverance & strength behind this accomplishment. #FL02 https://t.co/5fC4yvHzuO

The scientific advances I've seen in the past few months have been absolutely incredible. We're another step closer to restoring renewing & rebuilding our great nation.  #OperationWarpSpeed #COVID19 #FL02 https://t.co/ZYEgtIAa0d

My sincerest condolences to @realDonaldTrump & his family. Losing a family member is never easy. I’m praying for you and your family during this difficult time. God bless you all. https://t.co/F6wb30BABD

As of July 30th #FL02 has had a self-response rate of 51.6%. These numbers affect funding for schools healthcare block grants businesses relocating to the area & representation.   Make sure you're counted before Sept 30th - https://t.co/FAY2SPCojy #2020Census https://t.co/0D1DMY6s4K
Today we honor the over one million heroes who were wounded or killed in action. Thank you for your incredible service and sacrifice. God bless you all. #FL02 #PurpleHeartDay https://t.co/bypPozc7id

This puts us in a vulnerable position. Americans should not have to fear shortages of critical medicines or other supplies. This executive order puts us one step closer to renewing restoring & rebuilding our nation. #FL02 #BuyAmerican

I applaud President Trump & his Administration for taking the initiative to make our nation more independent as we fight the #COVID19 pandemic. For far too long we’ve relied on suppliers outside of the US & our allies for medical supplies & essential prescription drugs. #FL02

I am deeply saddened by the loss of Liberty County Commissioner Dexter Barber. He was a good man & a dedicated public servant. Please join me in praying for his family & his community. https://t.co/oMXp4TQz6Q #FL02 #Florida
Thanks for having me on! It's always a pleasure. https://t.co/nOZ21qB46q

It is easy to give up hope & succumb to fear but that is a recipe for failure for us & our children. The only way to overcome this pandemic is to approach it with facts courage & a level-head. Read my latest op-ed here: https://t.co/jdQd1fnPzC #FL02 #COVID19

While the #NDAA bill is not perfect I’m looking forward to working with President Trump & the Senate on a finished product that keeps our nation strong and ensures our servicemembers have what they need. Read more here: https://t.co/baVQCMw6Mu #FL02
This bill is consistent with President Trump’s topline defense budget request & includes a 3% pay increase for our troops.  #FL02 #NDAA

This afternoon I voted yes on the National Defense Authorization Act for FY 2021 (NDAA). As a veteran & Rep of a district with a large military presence taking care of our troops is a top priority. #FL02 #NDAA
If you have recovered from #COVID19 PLEASE consider donating plasma. Your donation could save lives! #FL02 #Florida https://t.co/HYSP9PIEY2

I'm saddened by the loss of my colleague Congressman John Lewis. John made a significant contribution to Congress & the Civil Rights Movement. Regardless of partisan affiliation we have lost a great American & friend. My prayers are with the Lewis family at this time. https://t.co/rceWyvxbfJ

DON'T FORGET: The last day to file & pay your 2019 federal income taxes is July 15th (THIS WEDNESDAY).  To file your 2019 federal income tax return for FREE through the IRS website click here: https://t.co/0e4D13RPxE #FL02 #federaltaxes #Florida
Read my full release about the SCOTUS decision here: https://t.co/7pnh4IUfzO #FL02

I am proud to have joined my colleagues earlier this year in urging SCOTUS to protect the sanctity of life & preserving religious liberty. Our Constitution ensures that no group is punished for standing by their religious principles & I stand by the Constitution. #FL02

Today’s #SCOTUS decision is not just a win for religious liberty but also life. For too long Obama-era mandates have strangled religious groups like the Little Sisters of the Poor. This is unconstitutional. https://t.co/Kbm9TXyrjb #FL02

Registration has begun for the Congressional App Challenge a programming competition for students in middle & high school. Students are tasked with creating coding & implementing a new & innovative computer app. For more details - https://t.co/GOfdl0ui7f #FL02 #Congress4CS https://t.co/pxdkrUdb5W

Though this year’s celebration will be different than those of the past we are blessed to live in the greatest country in the world.   I hope that you have a happy and safe Independence Day! #FL02 #Florida https://t.co/mH3Tafe9A8

Outstanding news - The Dept of Labor is reporting that the U.S. economy has added a record 4.8 million jobs in June. This drops the unemployment rate from 13.3% to 11.1%. Let's keep this up! #FL02 https://t.co/5UTXPqs3tu
As we continue to combat #COVID19 and head into a holiday weekend I want to share some updated commonsense tips to protect you & your family. #Florida #FL02 https://t.co/3xXDlLHSYy

The Census affects Florida's funding for education health transportation water & waste infrastructure affordable housing the arts and the environment.   Please fill out your Census today. #Census2020 https://t.co/vW99ScgY3U
This is happening right now. Stream the hearing here. #FL02 #veteransaffairs https://t.co/FVKJRa0lxF

The Paycheck Protection Program & other relief measures are working! We still have a long way to go but this is a very good sign.   If your #smallbusiness is in need of assistance please visit the SBA website here: https://t.co/xDrK7sNhU7 #FL02 https://t.co/1SPeZSPXft

Christ Cordon was a true leader and had a strong work ethic. I'm grateful to have not only known him but to have the pleasure of calling him my friend.  My prayers are with his beautiful family during this difficult time. May God bless you all. #FL02

Christ Cordon has been a beloved member of the Panama City community for as long as I can remember. His selfless heart and humility are certainly a rarity nowadays. I know that this loss is a tough one for everyone who knew him. #FL02 https://t.co/KAGwYxd1Gu
I'm grateful to @SecBernhardt for making his way out to #FL02. It has been a busy couple of days but it meant a lot to me to show him our area & how we've recovered thus far. Thank you!

Another excellent day w/ @SecBernhardt!   Today we participated in a prescribed burn. Prescribed burns have become somewhat second nature to us in Florida especially the Panhandle but many don't realize how essential these burns are to maintaining our beautiful forests.  #FL02 https://t.co/59EBzC0kjO

I’ve had a great day supporting outdoor recreation & showing the @SecBernhardt around our beautiful district. We started the day at @halfhitchpcb & worked our way to Cape San Blas.   Looking forward to continuing this tour tomorrow! #FL02 https://t.co/v3C2A9qnzO

This is such a heartbreaking story! I'm grateful that the person responsible was found. My heart goes out to FWC Officer Julian Keen's family & friends as well as the entire @MyFWC team. #FL02    https://t.co/xCjVdUiBpx
Happy 245th Birthday to the U.S. Army! It is an honor and privilege to have served with some of our nation’s finest.  #FL02 #GoArmy https://t.co/c1N4AgcENz
Please join me in wishing @realDonaldTrump a happy birthday! #FL02 #HappybirthdayDonaldTrump https://t.co/yFLQ7IQn9A

WOW! Dixie Education Foundation Inc. has awarded 286 scholarships to 66 graduates. The scholarships total more than $249000 & 126 donors pitched in to make this possible. Outstanding work! Thank you to everyone involved! #FL02 #DixieCounty https://t.co/4DyLtEQtTD

Excellent news! The @USDA just announced that all kids will be able to get free meals for the rest of the summer. Thank you to Secretary Purdue & the several individuals throughout the district who are making this possible! #FL02 https://t.co/wqHp5Wq8A4

It was a pleasure Skylar! Thanks for having me! #FL02 https://t.co/6hu9pONgDh

My favorite part of this segment is when the owner of History Class Brewing Company says that our area's business owners are programmed to never give up. He's absolutely spot on! Our area is resilient. #FL02 https://t.co/ildf4C7nVb

Today begins our district's least favorite season - Hurricane Season. Now is a good time to go over your evacuation plans check for loose limbs restock supplies etc. I will continue to keep you updated with vital resources and information. https://t.co/1VwnGiKmB5 #FL02
Looking forward to the launch today! Liftoff is currently scheduled for 3:22 pm ET/2:22 pm CT. #LaunchAmerica #FL02 https://t.co/6PJvUx8Yqf

I'm joining @GOPLeader @SteveScalise & Colleagues in filing a lawsuit challenging the constitutionality of the Democrat rule on proxy voting. Essential employees have been expected to work throughout this pandemic. Why are we not required to come to work? #FL02 https://t.co/KstOmzlGEr

Here are some of my fav moments from my small business visit in Washington Co.   You guys have done well under these unprecedented circumstances. We still have a lot of work to do but I feel very optimistic after talking with these outstanding small business owners. #FL02 https://t.co/ytMIaP6lhc

Today we recognize those who gave the ultimate sacrifice while serving in the Armed Forces. It’s because of their bravery & dedication to our nation that we’re able to enjoy the freedom we have today. May we take a moment to remember these exceptional individuals. #FL02 https://t.co/LdWolSdZ0m
